newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: S.Korea NLCF buys 18,000T Chinese cottonseed meal. [CORRECTED 11:20 GMT]
newsitem.headline: S.Korea NLCF buys 18,000T Chinese cottonseed meal. [CORRECTED 11:20 GMT]

text.p: South Korea's National Livestock Cooperatives Federation (NLCF) bought 18,000 tonnes of Chinese cottonseed meal from Haitai International Corp, an official with the federation said on Tuesday.
The official said the federation also bought 15,000 tonnes of Thai tapioca from Toepfer at $86.96 a tonnes C&F (Corrects from $96.73 a tonne). All port rotation premiums were set at $1.50 a tonne.
The NLCF official said it passed on tenders for 30,000 tonnes of tapioca and 20,000 tonnes of rice bran pellet due to high offer prices.
He said it would re-invite the passed tenders on Friday.
Details of the tender results are as follows:
COMMODODITY TONNES ETA/ARRIVAL PORT PRICE SELLER
